price: Na kung sakaling nagpakatuwid[682] sila sa daan [ng Islām] ay talaga sanang nagpatubig Kami sa kanila ng isang tubig na masagana [na panustos]
arabic: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقٗا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-allawi is'taqāmū ʿalā al-ṭarīqati la-asqaynāhum māan ghadaqan
translations: surely We (would) have given them to drink
